subject: NCAA Ice Hockey Championships
Coaches and Managers
Traffic Accidents and Safety
Hockey, Ice
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Norm Bazin, who was seriously injured in an automobile accident in 2003, has led UMass-Lowell to the N.C.A.A. Division I men’s hockey tournament in his first year as the team’s coach.
snippet: Norm Bazin, who was seriously injured in an automobile accident in 2003, has led UMass-Lowell to the N.C.A.A. Division I men’s hockey tournament in his first year as the team’s coach.
